skillTree.name: Sneaky
skillTree.description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!

skillTree.name: Tricksy
skillTree.description: All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Rat-Karuta
skillTree.description: Innovative eastern techniques of armour assembly make it slightly less dangerous for the Sorcerer to be in range of their enemies’ attacks.

skillTree.name: Cathayan Training
skillTree.description: Those of Eshin knowledgeable in the Cathayan art of war are few and far between, using their learned secrets to advance their brood’s malevolence.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +40
	(armies in local province)

skillTree.name: Tail Weapon
skillTree.description: Whether by attachment or mutation, something nasty and spiky on your tail has got to bring no little advantage in battle.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Tenacity
skillTree.description: This one will not go down easily - it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15% for "Warp Stars Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Warp Stars"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Warp Stars Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Skitterleap Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Armour of Darkness Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Armour of Darkness"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Armour of Darkness Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Veil of Shadows Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Veil of Shadows"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Veil of Shadows Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Brittle Bone Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Brittle Bone"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Brittle Bone Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Black Whirlwind Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Black Whirlwind"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Black Whirlwind Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Scouting
skillTree.description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Spread Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Skaven corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Skaven corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Skaven corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Sharp Claws
backgroundSkills.description: "I keep them sharp, yes-yes. Always ready for the challenge that I know is coming, yes-yes!"

backgroundSkills.name: Sharp Teeth
backgroundSkills.description: "When they come for you, go straight for the throat and tear it clean out. They won't come again."

backgroundSkills.name: Warpstone Hoarder
backgroundSkills.description: "Most precious of all substances, the pulse of our life."

effects.description:
Upkeep: -15% for Warpfire Thrower, Warp Lightning Cannon and Doomwheel units
	(all units in army)

ui_effects.description: Sacrifice a weak unit to destroy foes

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description: Greatly reduced chance of being detected while in ambush stance

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target
